GSD.description:
ALSA: pcm: Test for "silence" field in struct "pcm_format_data"

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.190 by commit 377a80ca6590f40ec8a85227b889a5d399fe26c3. For more details please see the references link.
